title: Can't open friends list, or accept game invites
body:
Whenever I go to click on the button to open the list, or accept a game invite nothing happens.

Any idea on how to fix this?

replies.body: Failures with chat features could be caused by connection issues that lose comms with the chat server.  Relogging should be get this fixed up and sync back to the chat servers.  If you continue to have issues, I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide in case of an issue with your networking having trouble maintaining a connection to the server.  Hopefully, everything is okay now!
